chapters.title: Chapter 24: Scouting and Discoveries
chapters.info: Hammar, p. 283 (225)—Warder in charge of teaching the sword in the White Tower. He likes to smoke while instructing, using the pipe to gesture. He let Mat challenge Galad and Gawyn to a two-swords-on-one-quarterstaff fight. He expected Mat to win, and that the incident would serve to humble Galad and Gawyn. He was right.
